title: Pokémon: The First Movie
description: Watch Ash and his friends confront the powerful Legendary Pokémon Mewtwo in Pokémon: The First Movie, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Pokémon: The First Movie
media.description: Team Rocket leader Giovanni hires a scientist to leverage his knowledge of cloning to create a living weapon. That weapon, a Pokémon named Mewtwo, is furious at being used by humanity. Ash, Pikachu, and their friends try to stop Mewtwo’s path of destruction and prove that people and Pokémon are defined by their choices, not their origin.
